Complete abortion
Th e following are the signs of complete abortion:
• Th  ere is light bleeding or there has been heavy bleeding which has now stopped.
• Th  ere is lower abdominal pain.
• Th  ere is a history of expulsion of POC.
• Abdominal examination shows a uterus that is soft  er than normal, and the fundal height 
is less
